name: Age of Empires III: The WarChiefs
name_original: Age of Empires III: The WarChiefs
description:
Age of Empires III: The WarChiefs is a strategy game developed by Ensemble Studios. It came out on 17-10-2006. Microsoft Studios published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Age of Empires III: The WarChiefs is available on PC.
David Rippy produced the game. It was directed by David P. Kubalak, Graeme Devine, Sandy Petersen and Tony Goodman. It was scored by David Rippy, Kevin McMullan and Stephen Rippy.
